description: The equipment log/service segment is the data necessary to maintain an adequate audit trail of events that have occurred on a particular piece of equipment.

1.name: Event type
1.description: This field identifies the type of event of the message. Refer to HL7 Table 0450 – Event type for valid values

2.name: File Name
2.description: This field is the physical file name that is being used to store information about the transmitted log and/or service event

3.name: Start Date/Time
3.description: This field is the date/time that the event started

4.name: End Date/Time
4.description: This field is the date/time that the event was completed

5.name: Transaction Data
5.description: This field is the data that the log and/or service event was about and is to be logged
